page.title: 13Old residents.
page.content:
{Mr Sykes}has lived in Sutton for 40 years.He likes it here because it quiet.He doesn't like dogs and their mess.He collects cat ornaments and has 52 in total.He doesn't like holiday makers as he likes Sutton to be quiet. {Mr Sykes}is 80 and has no thoughts of moving.
{Mrs Graham}has lived in Sutton for 50 years.She likes Sutton because it is peaceful and she doesn't want to move anywhere else.{Mrs Graham}would like Sutton to have more amusements because she has got young grandchildren.She likes watching children go to and from school every day.She hasn't got a job but she is fit enough to walk to the shops some days.
